member.summary: Sets the vertex color blending. 0.0f means that the projector's vertex color is used, while 1.0f means the vertex color of the surface onto which the projection happens is used or white in the case that the surface has no vertex colors.

member.name: T:DS_DecalProjector
member.summary: Instances of this class are used for projections onto meshes and terrains. They have to be placed in child game objects of a instance. For runtime purposes, instances may be more appropriate.

member.name: T:DS_DecalProjectorGroup
member.summary: Instances of this class are used for the grouping of child game objects. Decal groups are only used in the Unity Editor to modify the transforms of all its child projectors at once. Those objects have no effect at runtime.

member.name: T:DS_Decals
member.summary: Instances of this class are used to manage the visualization of decal projections onto meshes and terrains. While the actual cutting operations are performed in decals meshes and decals mesh cutters, objects of this type provide the required rendering infrastructure. Decals meshes can be applied to instances of this class and both the creation and destruction of the objects is handled automatically. For the visualization of projections onto skinned meshes, there is .

member.summary: Wrapper for DecalProjectorComponents to make them usable for DecalsMeshes.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Add the specified a_Terrain with a_TerrainToDecalsMatrix.

member.summary: Add the specified a_Terrain with a_TerrainToDecalsMatrix and the specified a_Density. This method is only supported in Decal System Pro.
member.param: Densitiy in range [0.0f, 1.0f] where 1.0f is the default and 0.0f the minumum number of vertices.

member.summary: Gets the vertex color blending for the projector. 0.0f means that the projector's vertex color is used, while 1.0f means the vertex color of the surface onto which the projection happens is used or white in the case that the surface has no vertex color. member.name: T:DS_SkinnedDecalProjector
member.summary: Instances of this class are used for projections onto skinned meshes in the Unity Editor. They are supposed to be placed in child game objects of a object. For runtime purposes, instances may be more appropriate.

member.name: T:DS_SkinnedDecalProjectorGroup
member.summary: Instances of this class are used for the grouping of instances in the Unity Editor to modify all relevant transforms at once. Those objects have no effect at runtime.

member.name: T:DS_SkinnedDecals
member.summary: Instances of this class are used to manage the visualization of skinned decal projections onto skinned meshes. While the actual cutting operations are performed in skinned decals meshes and skinned decals mesh cutters, objects of this type provide a rendering infrastructure. Skinned decals meshes can be applied to instances of this class and both the creation and destruction of the objects is handled automatically. For the visualization of projections onto meshes and terrains, there is .
